roles.name: Dooleydd - Croddnin admin

text/plain.example:
{
    "isActivated": true,
    "permissions": [    "List all company projects",
                        "Read a specific project",
                        "Create projects",
                        "Update a specific project",
                        "Delete a specific project",
                        "Read all Company projects",
                        "Read all company projects",
                        "List all company quotes",
                        "Read a specific quote",
                        "Create quotes",
                        "Update a specific quote",
                        "Delete a specific quote",
                        "Read product quotes",
                        "Read sale quotes",
                        "List all company sales",
                        "Read a specific sale",
                        "Create sales",
                        "Update a specific sale",
                        "Delete a specific sale",
                        "Read client sales",
                        "List all company users",
                        "Read a specific company user",
                        "Create company users",
                        "Update a specific company user",
                        "Delete a specific company user"],
    "name": "ROLE_TEST",
    "companyId": "607bbeb0cfe1e435b272aa93"
}

text/plain.example:
{
    "isActivated": true,
    "permissions": [
                            "List all Bank accounts",
                    "Read a specific bank account",
                    "Create bank accounts",
                    "Update a specific bank account",
                    "Delete a specific bank account",
                    "Read all clients bank accounts",
                    "List all company clients",
                    "Read a specific client account",
                    "Create client accounts",
                    "Update a specific client account",
                    "Delete a specific client account",
                    "Read number of clients By Company",
                    "List all user Companies",
                    "Read a specific Company account",
                    "Create Company accounts",
                    "Update a specific Company account",
                    "Delete a specific Company account",
                    "Read all admins account in a specific company",
                    "Read all user's companies accounts"
    ],
    "name": "NEWROLE",
    "companyId": "607540af3537e6fff01d23fc"
}
